lots.description: We are current out to tender for the provision of XSuppliers that would like to take part in this tender process are invited to express interest. Suppliers will be given access to the full tender documentation through Organisation Name`s e-tendering system. When the tender documents have been made available, involved suppliers will receive notification via email and the tender documents can be accessed from the `My Tenders` area on this website and by selecting the `View Details` button of this project. Expressions of interests will only be accepted until xx-xx-2016. Please allow sufficient time to make your return as late returns will not be permitted. Any questions relating to this tender should be made via correspondence on the website and can be addressed to the main contact as shown in the details above.

additionalClassifications.description: IT services: consulting, software development, Internet and support

classifications.description: Ministry or any other national or federal authority, including their regional or local subdivisions
